body.name: Arm & Hammer Clean Burst, 105 Loads Liquid Laundry Detergent, 105 fl oz
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 9 hrs 31 mins
features: One 105 fl oz bottle of ARM & HAMMER Clean Burst Liquid Laundry Detergent cleans 105 medium loads when used as directed
Concentrated laundry detergent is formulated to get out tough dirt and odors with 2X powerful stain fighters in every load versus leading value detergent
Blended with ARM & HAMMER Baking Soda, this HE laundry detergent is formulated to deeply clean clothes
Liquid concentrated laundry detergent features a crisp, just-washed clean fragrance that infuses a fresh scent to towels, sheets, team uniforms and more
Clean-rinsing, low-sudsing formula won’t block HE machine sensors, making it an effective choice for both standard and HE washers
body.description: ARM & HAMMER Clean Burst Liquid Laundry Detergent powers out dirt and odors for the clean you need. This HE laundry detergent is concentrated with 2X powerful stain fighters in every load versus the leading value detergent, making it powerful enough to handle your toughest loads in all wash temperatures, even cold water. This low-sudsing laundry soap rinses clean and is designed to work in standard machines and High Efficiency (HE) models as an effective and efficient laundry cleaner and stain remover. Infuse a fresh scent into towels, sheets, team uniforms and more with the crisp, clean fragrance of this laundry detergent liquid. Blended with trusted ARM & HAMMER Baking Soda, this HE detergent is tough on odors, dirt and stains, leaving clothes clean and smelling fresh. For standard bottles, fill the cap to Bar A for medium-sized loads, or use half a capful for energy-saving cold water cycles compared to washing in warm water. Use a full cap of this detergent for large or heavily soiled loads for a powerful clean at a smart, low price. For larger dispenser sizes, fill to the top of Line C for medium loads. For large or heavily soiled loads, use half a capful.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: A trusted solution for more than 170 years. Pure and simple Versatile and Affordable. Gentle Yet Powerful. For generation of families, ARM & HAMMER has been stand of purity and a trusted household staple in millions of cabinets and pantries.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Smells great, works great, great value
reviews.reviewText: Arm & Hammer Clean Burst has a pleasant scent and it works well-plus it's priced very well and goes a long way. This detergent doesn't discolor clothing when using it for pretreating and it rinses well. The scent is long lasting and not too strong.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cheapest on Amazon (I've Looked)-- and Amazing Cleaning Power. NOT Eco Friendly.
reviews.reviewText: Update: After many years, I am stepping away from this product because of the insane amount of plastic packaging. I was able to find laundry detergent sheets on Amazon for less per. load than this product, and the only waste from that is recycled paper (from the box). I would encourage everyone to switch! Cheaper, takes up less space, better for the planet, way lighter to carry up/down stairs.This is the cheapest laundry detergent on Amazon. It cleans even the stinkiest clothes, removes stains, and has little to no scent of its own. It is also gentle on clothing! After many years, I am stepping away from this product because of the insane amount of plastic packaging. I was able to find laundry detergent sheets on Amazon for less per. load than this product, and the only waste from that is recycled paper (from the box). I would encourage everyone to switch!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Get Laundry Oh-so-Clean and Works Great in our Home Greywater System
reviews.reviewText: This Arm & Hammer Detergent is a must have for washing all of my laundry. Gets laundry clean and fresh, everything from delicates to dirty heavy throw rugs. Rinses out beautifully. I use cold water for all laundry washing; even extra soiled laundry always comes out clean with this detergent.We have a House Greywater System, all of our clothes washing machine discharge water is diverted to our backyard for watering trees and other vegetation. This detergent works great in our Greywater System, trees and vegetation love the clothes washing machine water. A great value, too.I highly recommend this product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2023
reviews.reviewText: One of the bottles was damaged and seal was broken caused product to spill in the box

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Cleans clothes well, smells good, good price. Trusted brand.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars my favorite laundry detergent
reviews.reviewText: I like it , it works great on my clothes and bedding I like the handle on the jug it makes it easy to pour and carry . It doesn't leave a fake scent on my clothes, I like that becuz I don't care to smell like fake flowery laundry detergents no thank you.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Scent...excellent alternative to pods
reviews.reviewText: I LOVE the smell of the pod version of this, and I use them often, but I needed to buy a liquid detergent because I don't always have loads big enough to justify wasting a pod on. This is perfect to throw in a tiny amount of detergent and get those small loads of clothes smelling clean and looking fresh! :) For sure an excellent purchase and something I always need on hand. Worth the value, and LOVE the cleaning power and scent.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars cheap and effective
reviews.reviewText: Very good and soft . love product
Been using this brand for a while, my son has severe allergies but this one with scent he does not react too
